level.heading: Mediation or arbitration of disputes.
level.text: Upon receipt of a complaint against an employment agency, employment counseling service, employer-paid personnel service, job listing service, or employment counselor, the Mayor may seek to mediate the dispute or arrange for arbitration by an impartial arbitrator or panel of arbitrators.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-136, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 32-401.
